title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 56.2 - Penalty for failure by pilot to obey order
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 56.2 - Penalty for failure by pilot to obey order

State Regulations

Failure to obey promptly any order relative to the
performance of duty which a pilot may receive, either directly from the
president of the association or other body of pilots licensed by the
commissioners of which the pilot may be a member, or through the medium of any
person or persons charged with the issuance or transmittal of orders relative
to the performance of duty, shall subject a pilot to revocation or suspension
of his license in the discretion of the commissioners. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
56.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
